remarks: Closure of a finite sum of positive reals.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jun-2014.)
statement:
fsumcl.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fsumrpcl.2 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= (/) ) $.
fsumrpcl.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. RR+ ) $.
fsumrpcl $p |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A B e. RR+ ) $.
$d A k $.
$d k ph $.
